features: Comfortable and supportive: Innovative lever locking system provides support and structure
Four-season performance: Insulated pad with R-value of 5 adds warmth and comfort
Lightweight and strong: weighs 6.3lbs, supports 320 pounds
Compact and packable: easily fits into an included 7”x21.5” carry sack
Simple set-up: intuitive design features a frame that locks easily into place
Advanced engineering: proprietary DAC TH72M Aluminum alloy frame is light, durable and strong
Performance materials: Durable woven sleep platform is strong, light, and breathable
Durable design: Built for serious use, the cot is backed by a five year warranty
Convertible and adaptable: Purchase leg extensions or sleep without the pad to customize your sleep system
